mapper.select: SELECT comment_id, board_id, writer, content, created_at, updated_at FROM comment WHERE board_id = #{boardId} ORDER BY created_at DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comment (board_id, writer, content, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{boardId}, #{writer}, #{content}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE comment SET content = #{content}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE comment_id = #{commentId}
